Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the antibacterial vermipeptides family (AVPF)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.European Journal of Soil Biology, 2007, 43 S127-S134] Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas pyocyanea (IC=12.58 μg/ml), Acinetobacter baumanii (IC=12.58 μg/ml), Klebsiella terrigena (IC=12.58 μg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Enterococcus gallinarum (IC=12.58 μg/ml), Enterococcus faecalis (IC=25.68 μg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: A novel antimicrobial vermipeptide family from earthworm Eisenia fetida.
Literature.Author: C Wang, Z Suna, X Zhang, G Xu
